name: Factory: Slime
description:
Welcome to Factory: Slime! A simply little isometric game where you have to guide slimes through a factory to various "bins", with each bin having its own quota that must be filled by getting colored buckets into them. To do this, you must use various contraptions to guide them to the buckets!

This game was created for the GC Game Jam 3 by Xanco and Hey_Zack_. I hope you enjoy our game which was made in 4 days.
